long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the addictive fun of Wordle right in your browser! Test your vocabulary skills and enjoy daily word challenges with our Wordle Game Chrome extension. Guess the hidden word in five tries or less and improve your word-guessing prowess with each game.

Features:

Added a Spanish Functionality!
Over 200 Spanish words for more users to enjoy.
Easy-to-use interface with a sleek, minimalist design.
Over 200,000 words in word bank for a unique challenge.
